mapper.select: SELECT L.L_NO, L.L_TITLE, LA.C_NAME, L.PRICE, L.USER_NO, M.USER_NAME, T.T_NICK, U_C_NAME, NVL(AR.AVG_RATING, 0) AS TOTAL_REVIEW_RATING, NVL(C_COUNT,0) AS T_USER_NUMBER ,L.L_REGION_SUB, NVL(ar.l_review_count,0) AS L_REVIEW_COUNT, L.L_CATE_MAIN, L.L_CATE_SUB FROM LESSON_INFO L JOIN TUTOR T ON(L.USER_NO = T.USER_NO) JOIN LESSON_ATTACHMENT LA ON(LA.L_NO = L.L_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = L.USER_NO) JOIN USERPROPIC UPR ON(UPR.USER_NO = L.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN AVG_REVIEW AR ON(AR.L_NO = L.L_NO) LEFT JOIN COUNT_CLASS CC ON(CC.L_NO = L.L_NO) WHERE ((L.L_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%') OR (L.L_INTRODUCTION LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%')) AND LA.LA_TYPE = 1 AND L.L_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY L.L_NO DESC
